name: I Buildings
overview:
Since our incorporation is in year 2005, we, “I Buildings” are a recognized organization engaged in distributing and trading a commendable range of Cameras, Video Recorder, Burglar Alarms and Home Automation.

Our Products : we offer Waterproof Camera Powered by Co-Axial Cable, American Dynamics Discover 300, 500 & 700 Bullet Cameras, Medium & Long Range True Day/Night Bullet Cameras, HD High Definition Weatherproof Color/Mono IR Bullet Camera, TruVision Cam IR Bullet High-Res Camera and High-Res Bullet Camera With InfraRed.

Mission: To become the preferred supplier for engineering services and integrated solutions to our valued customers in the diversified market segments we serve.

Vision: To be the leading automation organization in the market by meeting and exceeding customer expectations to achieve their business objectives and maximize their performance

Our People: Considered as the most valuable assets, iBuildings team of professionals and engineers are manufacturer trained and certified with outstanding performance record that revolves around one concept “Client Satisfaction”.

Facts and Figures: • Trained and certified professional staff • Quality Management • Ability to commit and deliver • Application Oriented Pre-Sales Team: Home Automation, Lighting Control, Security, Intrusion alarm
